message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it has tremendous potential and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your company. My initial offer is $2000000. Please let me know your thoughts.
Alice, your offer is way above my budget.  I'm very interested in the product, but I can only go as high as $1400000 at this time.  Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. While I'm willing to negotiate, $1400000 is unfortunately too low. I'm prepared to come down to $1750000, acknowledging the value you see in this product. Please let me know if this revised offer works for you.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $1750000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1550000.  I'm very serious about this product and I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
